name: The Ranger
description:
The start of a physics based puzzle platformer.  Very buggy - for now.  You have two types of arrows you can shoot.  Regular arrows, which become one way platforms when stuck in a wall, and rope arrows, which create a rope bridge from the player to where arrow is in a wall if the gap is short enough.  Again, very buggy - for now.

Update Sept30 2014

- Joystick controls are disabled for now

- mouse and keyboard controls now available!

-WASD to move 

- Mouse pointer controls the bow 

- Left click shoots the arrow

- middle click or "E" to change arrow type
